name: Gait
headline: Building Dev Infra for AI Software Engineers
description: Ever been confused by a block of AI-generated code? Gait is a Cursor and VS Code extension that will let you view the prompt that generated code. Continue off of your coworker's conversations, view analytics on your AI codegen use, and more!

founders.name: Alex Hsia, Founder
founders.description: Former Dev at Jane Street, Mercury, and CMU CS. Building better devtools to connect developers and AI codegen

founders.name: Kyle Li, Founder
founders.description: Former dev at Jane Street, Stripe, and Columbia CS. Building better tools to connect developers and AI codegen.

raw_markdown='[![gait logo](https://getgait.com/gait.png)gait](https://getgait.com/</>)[Guide](https://getgait.com/</guide>)[Analytics](https://getgait.com/</auth>)[Get Started](https://getgait.com/</getting-started>)[](https://getgait.com/<https:/github.com/gait-ai/gait>)
# Code Faster with AI, Without All the Guesswork
Gait is a collaboration tool that stores prompts, context, and code together. Easily understand and edit your team's AI-generated code.
Download for Github CopilotDownload for Cursor
Backed by![Y Combinator](https://getgait.com/yc-logo.png)
[![gait - Git-Blame for AI-Generated Code | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/featured.svg?post_id=501050&theme=light)](https://getgait.com/<https:/www.producthunt.com/posts/gait?embed=true&utm_source=badge-featured&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-gait>)
## Features
### AI Blame
Link prompts and conversations directly to generated code.
![AI Blame](https://getgait.com/gait_blame_hover_no_dither.gif)
### Codegen Analytics
Measure the impact of AI on your codebase and productivity.
See Your Stats!See Our Stats!![Gait Dashboard](https://getgait.com/dashboard.png)
### Team Collaboration
Share AI-assisted development context with your team through version control.
![Team Collaboration](https://getgait.com/team_collab.gif)
## How It Works
1
### Capture Conversations
gait automatically saves AI-codegen chats into a file in the .gait folder.
2
### Commit to Repo
Commit the .gait folder to your repo to share context with the team.
3
### Understand Code
During code review or when making further edits, read the prompts that led to a piece of code being generated.
## Download and Use gait
### How to Download
  1. Open VSCode or Cursor
  2. Go to the extension marketplace
  3. Search for "gait"
  4. Click "Install" to download the extension


### How to Start
  1. gait will automatically read your chat history
  2. Click through different files to see what code was generated with what prompt
  3. Commit your .gait folder to share the context with your team


## Choose Your Plan
### Open Source
  * Everything in your repo
  * Free to use
  * Basic AI conversation capture
  * Basic analytics

Get Started
### Pro
  * Use gait in code review
  * Prompt replay and model comparison
  * Codebase analytics
  * Copyright and IP protection

Contact Us

generated_description:
### Gait: Simplifying AI Code Generation for Developers

**Company Overview:**
Gait, founded in 2024 and part of the Y Combinator Batch F24, is a San Francisco-based startup with a mission to streamline the development infrastructure for AI software engineers. Despite being a young company, Gait has quickly carved out a niche by addressing a common problem faced by developers working with AI-generated code.

**What Gait Does:**
Initially, Gait emerged as a response to confusion surrounding blocks of AI-generated code. Through their innovative Cursor and VS Code extension, Gait allows developers to view the prompts that generated the AI code, thus fostering a clearer understanding and more efficient collaboration among team members. Key features include:

- **AI Blame:** This feature links specific prompts and conversations directly with the corresponding pieces of generated code, making it easier to track the origins and rationale behind each line of code.
  
- **Codegen Analytics:** Developers can measure the impact of AI on their codebase and overall productivity, giving them insights into how AI tools are shaping their workflows.
  
- **Team Collaboration:** Gait enables teams to share AI-assisted development context through version control, enhancing collective understanding and streamlining code reviews.

**How It Works:**
1. **Capture Conversations:** Gait automatically saves AI interactions into a designated file within the `.gait` folder.
2. **Commit to Repo:** Developers commit the `.gait` folder alongside their code to share context with their teammates.
3. **Understand Code:** While reviewing code or making further edits, developers can reference the prompts that led to specific code generation.

**Getting Started:**
Using Gait is straightforward:
- Install the Gait extension from the VS Code or Cursor marketplaces.
- Gait will read the chat history automatically, allowing developers to navigate through various files and review generated code based on prompts.

**Plans:**
Gait offers a tiered service model:
- **Open Source:** Free access, basic AI conversation capture, and analytics.
- **Pro Version:** Includes advanced features like code review tools, prompt replay, model comparison, and enhanced analytics, along with protections for copyright and IP.

**Team and Leadership:**
Gait operates with a lean team of two and is mentored by Pete Koomen, who plays a pivotal role as their group partner at Y Combinator.

### Conclusion
In a world where AI is increasingly replacing traditional coding methods, Gait stands out by demystifying the process. With a focus on enhancing collaboration and comprehension among developers, Gait represents a significant step toward making AI tools more accessible and useful in everyday programming tasks. If you're navigating the complexities of AI-generated code, Gait might be the tool that helps you make sense of it all. 

For more information, check out their website at [getgait.com](https://getgait.com).
